00029 #ifndef LUBYK_INCLUDE_LK_SOCKET_H_
00030 #define LUBYK_INCLUDE_LK_SOCKET_H_
00031 
00032 #include "lubyk.h"
00033 #include "lubyk/msgpack.h"
00034 
00035 #include <sys/types.h>
00036 #include <sys/socket.h>
00037 #include <netdb.h>  // getaddrinfo
00038 #include <arpa/inet.h> // inet_ntop
00039 
00040 #include <errno.h>  // errno
00041 #include <string.h> // strerror

00043 #include <string>

00045 #include "lua_cpp_helper.h"

00047 // How many pending connections should wait for 'accept'.
00048 #define BACKLOG 10
00049 // recv buffer size (must be at least SIZEOF_SIZE)
00050 #define MAX_BUFF_SIZE 8196
00051 // 4 = size needed to encode SIZE_MAX
00052 #define SIZEOF_SIZE 4
00053 
00054 using namespace lubyk;
00055 
00056 typedef int LuaStackSize;
00057 
00058 namespace lk {
00059 
00067 class Socket : public LuaObject
00068 {
00069   int socket_fd_;
00070   int socket_type_;
00071   std::string local_host_;
00072   int local_port_;
00073   std::string remote_host_;
00074   int remote_port_;
00075 
00076   // buffer management
00079   int buffer_length_;
00080 
00084   int buffer_i_;
00085 
00088   char buffer_[MAX_BUFF_SIZE];
00089 
00093   bool non_blocking_;
00094 public:
00095 
00096   enum SocketType {
00097     TCP = SOCK_STREAM,
00098     UDP = SOCK_DGRAM,
00099   };
00100 
00101   Socket(int socket_type)
00102       // When changing this, also change the private
00103       // constructor.
00104       : socket_fd_(-1)
00105       , socket_type_(socket_type)
00106       , local_host_("*")
00107       , local_port_(-1)
00108       , remote_host_("?")
00109       , remote_port_(-1)
00110       , buffer_length_(0)
00111       , buffer_i_(0)
00112       , non_blocking_(false) {
00113   }
00114 
00115   ~Socket() {
00116     close();
00117   }
00118 
00119   void close() {
00120     if (socket_fd_ != -1) {
00121       ::close(socket_fd_);
00122       socket_fd_ = -1;
00123     }
00124   }
00125 
00129   int bind(const char *localhost = NULL, int port = 0);
00130 
00134   bool connect(const char *host, int port);
00135 
00138   void connectFinish();
00139 
00143   void listen(int backlog = BACKLOG);
00144 
00148   LuaStackSize accept(lua_State *L);
00149 
00150   void setRecvTimeout(int timeout) {
00151     setTimeout(timeout, SO_RCVTIMEO);
00152   }
00153     
00154   void setSendTimeout(int timeout) {
00155     setTimeout(timeout, SO_SNDTIMEO);
00156   }
00157 
00158   void setNonBlocking() {
00159     non_blocking_ = true;
00160     if (socket_fd_ != -1) {
00161       int x;
00162       x = fcntl(socket_fd_, F_GETFL, 0);
00163       if (-1 == fcntl(socket_fd_, F_SETFL, x | O_NONBLOCK)) {
00164         throw Exception("Could not set non-blocking (%s).", strerror(errno));
00165       }
00166     }
00167   }
00168   
00173   // ENABLE ONLY IF NEEDED (needs to be rewritten in Lua)
00174   // LuaStackSize recvMsg(lua_State *L);
00175 
00180   LuaStackSize recv(lua_State *L);
00181 
00186   int send(lua_State *L);
00187 
00191   // ENABLE ONLY IF NEEDED (needs to be rewritten in Lua)
00192   // void sendMsg(lua_State *L);
00193 
00197   // ENABLE ONLY IF NEEDED (needs to be rewritten in Lua)
00198   // LuaStackSize request(lua_State *L) {
00199   //   sendMsg(L);
00200   //   return recvMsg(L);
00201   // }
00202 
00203   const char *localHost() const {
00204     return local_host_.c_str();
00205   }
00206 
00207   int localPort() const {
00208     return local_port_;
00209   }
00210 
00211   const char *remoteHost() const {
00212     return remote_host_.c_str();
00213   }
00214 
00215   int remotePort() const {
00216     return remote_port_;
00217   }
00218 
00219   int port() const {
00220     return local_port_;
00221   }
00222 
00223   int fd() const {
00224     return socket_fd_;
00225   }
00226 
00227 private:
00231    Socket(int fd, const char *local_host, const char *remote_host, int remote_port)
00232        : socket_fd_(fd)
00233        , local_host_(local_host)
00234        , local_port_(get_port(fd))
00235        , remote_host_(remote_host)
00236        , remote_port_(remote_port)
00237        , buffer_length_(0)
00238        , buffer_i_(0)
00239        , non_blocking_(false) {
00240   }
00241 
00242   static int get_port(int fd);
00243 
00244   void run(Thread *runner);
00245 
00246   int recvLine(lua_State *L);
00247 
00248   int recvBytes(lua_State *L, int sz);
00249 
00250   int recvAll(lua_State *L);
00251 
00252   void setTimeout(int timeout, int opt_name);
00253 };
00254 } // lk
